duties_responsibilities.duty: Administer and oversee all aspects of management, operation, and maintenance activities for wastewater facilities.
Formulate project goals, strategies, and SOPS; direct implementation of approved changes.
Achieve growth targets through new business development activities, contract negotiations, and securing renewals and scope expansion.
Manage teams related to hiring, on-boarding, performance management, training, development, salary, promotions, transfers, and terminations.
Maintain contract compliance and account management; meet with client representatives and council to discuss facility operations, maintenance, and capital projects.
Prepare and administer annual operating and capital budget; compose reports for the assigned area.
Ensure SOPs are followed and regulatory requirements are met; conduct routine facility inspections; interact with regulators as required.
Responsible for financial performance of the project, including client invoicing, account payables/receivables.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree preferred, 10+ years of experience in the operation of a water or wastewater treatment facility or an equivalent combination of education and experience.
Ability to obtain appropriate water or waste water certification based on facility managed.
Knowledge of water/wastewater facilities; advanced proficiency with Microsoft Office applications & internet.
Good communication skills; problem-solving abilities; ability to manage cost, quality, and expedience.
Motivates & empowers others; acts in accordance with company vision, mission & values; trains, coaches & mentors others.
The work environment may require the employee to occasionally lift and move up to 50 lbs. 5-10% travel required.
